name: Blu Adventure DEMO
description:
With 2 enemies types, 1 boss, and 6 non-boss level, this demo is jam pack with excitement! Go through an island as an energetic cube named Blu!

This is my first game, so please give feedback, whether it be love or criticism. thanks!

PS: I couldn't get the boss to work, so this will be it until Version 0.2

SORRY!!!
